name: Our Private Double Suite in the Sky!
description:
Best flight Ever!

Singapore Airlines A380 First Class Suites sets the new benchmark in first class travel.  The sense of space is unprecedented in the sky.  This is a real game-changer!

And what’s better than flying first class? Flying first class with someone you love!  The best seats for couples are suite 1 and 2 – when that wall comes down the space created is a massive 2 by 5 metres!  It was our private double suite in the sky!

The service, the food, the space, the DOUBLE BED!  This flight review covers it all.  
Join me on a flight of pure indulgence – Sydney to London return would cost almost $14,000AUD per person – I managed do an economy class/business/first class return combo from Australia to Vietnam with one sector in the First Class Suites for $4,000 – and yes I did pay for the tickets. 

Singapore Airlines A380 First Class Suites have set the new standard in first class travel!

Our Private Double Suite in the Sky!

Route:     Singapore (SIN) to Sydney (SYD)
Length:   3,916 miles,  6:48 hrs
Flight:     SQ221  Seat 1F & 2F
Aircraft:  Airbus A380-800  registration 9V-SKV (June 2017)
When:    11 May 2019

Camera:  Panasonic HC-VX1


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.

Q&A Video:    https://youtu.be/6VoRFtNDC04
